BBEX3.A.TOP.USD.CM.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Tonga / TOP 1 = USD ... (buying)
General: From 1999 to 2005, we only have data for the middle rates; see BBEX3:A:TOP:USD:CM:AC:A04.
Source: Since August 2006 Westpac Bank of Tonga, Nuku'alofa January 2006 - July 2006 Australia and New Zealand Banking Group (ANZ), Nuku'alofa 1991 - 1998 Bank of Tonga, Nuku'alofa
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.
